summary: This is an email chain from August 2021 regarding the organization of case files. It involves US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel and a contractor discussing saving a PDF of 'testifying witness notes' to specific folders on a shared drive related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Email request to save witness notes
events.description: An email was sent requesting that a PDF of 'testifying witness notes' be saved to specific folders on the Epstein share drive.

events.title: Confirmation of file save
events.description: A contractor confirms the requested PDF has been saved to both the specified folders.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 16-17, 2021, showing ongoing case file management for the Epstein investigation years after his death.
It references a 'testifying witness 3500 folder' and a 'witness folder on the Epstein share', indicating organized digital evidence storage for witness materials.
The correspondence involves personnel from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) and a contractor, showing continued administrative work on the case.
The subject 'testifying witness notes' suggests preparation or documentation related to witness testimony in the Epstein case.
All personal names in the email are redacted or represented by placeholders, indicating the document has been sanitized for public release.
